mapper.select: select EMP_NO from STDNT_ACAVSR_INFO where STDNT_NO = #{stdnt_no} and TKCG_YN = 'Y' order by STDNT_NO desc
select EMP_NO, EMP_FLNM from EMP_INFO where MNG_AUTHRT = 'C' order by EMP_NO desc
select * from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where MNG_AUTHRT = 'C' and (STTS_CD = '미승인' OR STTS_CD = '승인') order by APLY_SN desc
select * from DSCSN_APLY where EMP_NO = #{emp_no} and (STTS_CD = '미승인' OR STTS_CD = '승인') order by APLY_SN desc
select MAX(T1.EMP_NO) from EMP_INFO T1 where 1=1 and MNG_AUTHRT = 'C' and EMP_NO NOT IN (select S1.EMP_NO from DSCSN_APLY S1 where RSVT_DT = '20240918' and HR_SE = '2')

select APLY_SN, RSVT_DT, HR_SE, EMP_FLNM, DSCSN_MTHD, DSCSN_KND, STTS_CD from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where STDNT_NO = #{stdnt_no}
and BFR_APLY_SN IS NULL and STTS_CD = '완료' and ${search_part} like concat('%', #{search_word}, '%')
and BFR_APLY_SN IS NULL and STTS_CD = '완료'
and RSVT_DT >= now() and STTS_CD = '미승인'
and RSVT_DT >= now() and STTS_CD = '승인'
and BFR_APLY_SN IS NULL and (STTS_CD = '취소' or STTS_CD = '완료')
order by APLY_SN desc
limit ${pageno}, ${datano}
select * from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where APLY_SN = #{aply_sn} or BFR_APLY_SN = #{aply_sn} order by APLY_SN asc
select count(APLY_SN) from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where STDNT_NO = #{stdnt_no} and BFR_APLY_SN IS NULL and STTS_CD = '완료'
select count(BFR_APLY_SN) from VIEW_DSCSN_APLY where BFR_APLY_SN = #{aply_sn}
mapper.insert: insert into DSCSN_APLY (aply_sn, stdnt_no, emp_no, stts_cd, plc, hr_se, rsvt_dt, aply_dt, dscsn_mthd, dscsn_knd) values ('0', #{stdnt_no}, #{emp_no}, #{stts_cd}, #{plc}, #{hr_se}, #{rsvt_dt}, now(), #{dscsn_mthd}, #{dscsn_knd})
mapper.update: update DSCSN_APLY set STTS_CD = '취소' where APLY_SN = #{aply_sn}
